name:
Style Savvy: Trendsetters
Update Ver. 1.1
description:
Updated data for Nintendo 3DS title Style Savvy: Trendsetters.

If you own Style Savvy: Trendsetters, you should download this update.

This update fixes a bug that causes the Black Open-Back Turtleneck to disappear from your closet after being acquired.
disclaimer:
Updated data for Nintendo 3DS title Style Savvy: Trendsetters.

After the download, the icon for this data won't appear on the Nintendo 3DS HOME Menu. The data will instead appear in System Settings under Extra Data, so please don't delete it.
